notes.note: Prerequisite: Option I DEA majors only. Option I majors must take DEA 1102 and 1150 concurrently. B- or higher in DEA 1102 required to take DEA 2010. Must complete incomplete grade in this course before taking DEA 2010; Cost of materials: approx. $300, shop fee: $10.

Prerequisite: Option I DEA majors only; DEA 1101 with grade of B- or higher. Corequisite: DEA 1102. B- or higher in DEA 1150 required to take DEA 2010. Must complete incomplete grade in this course before taking DEA 2010; Cost of materials: approx. $200, technology fee: $10.
This course is offered in the summer. Discussion sections are now required, not optional.

notes.note: Writing in the Majors Section of DEA 1500.
Priority given to DEA majors; Lab fee: $10.

course.subject: DEA
course.course_title: Introduction to REVIT and Building Information Modeling (BIM)

notes.note: Recommended Prerequisite: DEA 2410, DEA 2420 (or equivalent); Advanced understanding of design process and construction issues is desirable; DEA Students/Upperclassmen taking the course for credit have priority; Students must attend the first class or they will not be permitted to add the course.

course.subject: DEA
course.course_title: Introduction to REVIT and Building Information Modeling (BIM)

notes.note: Recommended Prerequisite: DEA 2410, DEA 2420 (or equivalent); Advanced understanding of design process and construction issues is desirable; DEA Students/Upperclassmen taking the course for credit have priority; Students must attend the first class or they will not be permitted to add the course.

Only those students whose records show completion of these courses or enrollment status (e.g. junior, senior, graduate) will be allowed to enroll electronically during the pre-enrollment or Add/Drop period.]: must be DEA graduate students.
Prerequisite: DEA 4590/6500 or permission of instructor. Cost of materials: approx. $200.
